sec.title: Acknowledgments
sec.p: We thank Osvaldo Zábal and Diego Compaired for technical assistance during our work in the Biosafety level 4 facilities at the CICVyA-INTA. We are grateful to Winston Morris, Christian Cutullé, Félix Capellino and Fernando Delgado for their assistance in the collection of samples and tasks of clinical inspection.
